mapper.insert: insert into commute (CM_CODE, CM_TEAMNAME, CM_MCODE, CM_NAME, CM_ONTIME, CM_DATE) values (to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), #{CM_TEAMNAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CM_MCODE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CM_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI'), sysdate)
mapper.update: update commute set CM_OFFTIME = to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI') where CM_CODE=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
